title: Cash values for NS&I’s Index-linked Savings Certificates in November 2015 (NS&I - National Savings and ...
text: ( Source : NS&I - National Savings and Investments ) The cash value of NS& I'S Index-linked Savings Certificates has been updated to reflect the new Retail Prices Index ( RPI ). As of 13 October 2015 the Retail Prices Index stands at
